title: Technology & Infrastructure
subTitle: Built on Google Cloud's secure infrastructure, utilizing robust data pipelines and advanced AI integration to ensure high availability and scalability.
dataSourcesDesc: We aggregate and normalize high-velocity data from a wide array of sectors—including Cuisine trends, Social Media sentiment, E-commerce transactions, and Demographic shifts—to provide a holistic market view.
pipelineDesc: Our end-to-end processing architecture ensures data integrity: Data Lake Ingestion (Raw) → Automated Cleansing & Normalization → AI Modeling & Enrichment → Actionable Reporting via Google Cloud.
